subject: Skiing
lead_paragraph: C. R. Johnson, a professional free skier who had competed in superpipe and halfpipe at Winter X Games, died after he fell and hit his head on a rock outcropping while taking a run down a steep chute.
snippet: C. R. Johnson, a professional free skier who had competed in superpipe and halfpipe at Winter X Games, died after he fell and hit his head on a rock outcropping while taking a run down a steep chute.
